lexUnit.name: appraise.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: assess the value, quality, or performance of.

sentence.text: They are also responsible for helping you with your development and for appraising your performance , see APPRAISAL AND PERFORMANCE MONITORING .
In September the Education Secretary , Mr John MacGregor , said heads and governors could appraise performance in deciding promotion and pay -- just as managers in industry do .
He appraises his people 's performance without the use of expensive printed paper .
Now he merely appraised the situation , calculating the odds for life against death .
Phil Edwards from C & P 's environmental department has appraised the current situation .
And in terms of credibility with a wider public the idea that the work of a school is to be appraised by its teachers and governors alone simply will not wash .
General managers are appraised by their area managers and appraise their assistants .
Annie laughed once more as Billy put a hand up to his lips in mock horror and then her face suddenly flushed as she realised he was appraising her .
We will improve the Governments ' decommissioning proposals and appraise , with the industry , effective technical conservation measures .
The functions of such an enquiry would be to appraise ministers of the full facts surrounding the accident following an investigation of the causes of the accident .
Gone were the days when , in appraising his goods , a dealer relied mostly on his eye , experience and a tribal wisdom .
About 85 per cent of the 215 probate inventories which were appraised within the parish between 1521 and 1603 were valued at less than £50 and 68 per cent were priced under £30 .
An expensive-looking man in a black coat with a velvet collar was appraising a painting .
Father McCormack sat opposite Michael and appraised him .
Jill Goolden appraises Australian wines which are produced from some pretty vibrant vine varieties
Cleo appraised the woman in the bed .
Maintain an overview on your job and your personal goals , and regularly appraise progress .
The February 1984 extension to the LFA in the UK is critically appraised .
Two important oil discoveries in the Espinal block , Purificacion and Venganza , will be appraised in 1992 .
Not bothering to rise off the unpadded bunk , he appraised the pair critically , a slightly crestfallen look passing across his features when he considered Mait .
